metadata.title: Complete Binom API Encyclopedia - AI Ready
metadata.description: Comprehensive documentation with real data schemas and AI-optimized structure

authentication.note: Bearer token method does NOT work. Use api-key header instead.

affiliate_network.description: Manage affiliate networks and postback configurations

campaign.description: Campaign management with full CRUD and optimization

stats.description: Statistics and analytics with custom metrics

landing.description: Landing page management and file operations

/info/affiliate_network.description: Returns basic information about affiliate network. Array of 6 items (objects with 12 fields)

parameters.name: datePreset
parameters.description: Time period for data filtering. Required for stats endpoints.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Timezone for date calculations. Required for stats endpoints.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination

datePreset.description: Time period for data filtering. Required for stats endpoints.

timezone.description: Timezone for date calculations. Required for stats endpoints.

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return

offset.description: Number of records to skip for pagination

ai_instructions: Always use 'api-key' header for authentication, NOT Bearer token
Include datePreset and timezone parameters for stats endpoints
Info endpoints return basic entity information
Use for getting IDs and names before detailed operations
No custom metrics in info endpoints

401.description: Unauthorized - Wrong API key or header format

400.solution: Include datePreset and timezone for stats endpoints

404.description: Not Found - Invalid endpoint or resource ID
404.solution: Check endpoint path and resource existence

code_examples.python:
import requests
import os

api_key = os.getenv('binomPublic')
url = "https://pierdun.com/public/api/v1/info/affiliate_network"

headers = {
    "api-key": api_key,
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json"
}

params = {
    "datePreset": "last_7_days",
    "timezone": "UTC",
    "limit": 5,
    "offset": 0
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, params=params)

if response.status_code == 200:
    data = response.json()
    print(f"Success: {len(data)} records")
else:
    print(f"Error: {response.status_code} - {response.text}")

code_examples.python:
import requests
import os

api_key = os.getenv('binomPublic')
url = "https://pierdun.com/public/api/v1/stats/affiliate_network"

headers = {
    "api-key": api_key,
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json"
}

params = {
    "datePreset": "last_7_days",
    "timezone": "UTC",
    "limit": 5,
    "offset": 0,
    "groupBy": "id",
    "sortColumn": "clicks",
    "sortType": "desc"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, params=params)

if response.status_code == 200:
    data = response.json()
    print(f"Success: {len(data)} records")
else:
    print(f"Error: {response.status_code} - {response.text}")

custom_metrics.description: Stats endpoints return custom metrics with UUID keys
custom_metrics.ai_instruction: When encountering unknown UUID keys, ask operator for clarification

best_practices: Include timezone parameter to avoid confusion
Check response structure before processing data

steps: 2. GET /stats/campaign - Get performance metrics with custom fields

conversion_tracking.description: Track and update conversions with custom events
steps: 1. POST /conversions - Create conversion with custom events
4. Use event_1 to event_30 for custom tracking
2. Configure rules with criteria (geo, device, etc.)

missing_custom_metrics.problem: Custom metrics not returned in API response
missing_custom_metrics.solution: Check SettingsColumns configuration, ask operator for custom field names

empty_stats_response.solution: Ensure datePreset and timezone parameters are included

campaign_update_fails.solution: Include all required fields from original campaign structure
